body:
<!-- This form is for bug reports and feature requests ONLY!

If you're looking for help check [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/kubernetes) and the [troubleshooting guide](https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/debug-application-cluster/troubleshooting/).

If the matter is security related, please disclose it privately via https://kubernetes.io/security/.
-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:
@kubernetes/sig-scheduling-bugs 


**What happened**:
Here's an example from an e2e test:
https://storage.googleapis.com/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/ci-kubernetes-e2e-gci-gce-serial/4196/artifacts/bootstrap-e2e-master/kube-scheduler.log

```
I1011 00:01:23.747194       1 wrap.go:42] GET /healthz: (21.155µs) 200 [kube-probe/1.13+ 127.0.0.1:35748]
I1011 00:01:25.678930       1 leaderelection.go:227] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
I1011 00:01:27.721975       1 leaderelection.go:227] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
I1011 00:01:29.778759       1 leaderelection.go:227] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
I1011 00:01:31.825248       1 leaderelection.go:227] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
I1011 00:01:33.748955       1 wrap.go:42] GET /healthz: (23.09µs) 200 [kube-probe/1.13+ 127.0.0.1:35770]
I1011 00:01:33.890292       1 leaderelection.go:227] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
I1011 00:01:35.935005       1 leaderelection.go:227] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
I1011 00:01:37.984695       1 leaderelection.go:227] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
I1011 00:01:40.027758       1 leaderelection.go:227] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
I1011 00:01:42.084951       1 leaderelection.go:227] successfully renewed lease kube-system/kube-scheduler
```


**What you expected to happen**:
leader election success logs to be at a higher log level.

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: Leader election spamming scheduling logs
